name: MySmart+
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: After enabling the skills, you can control your Smart device on My Smart + App by voice through Alexa audio, control device start, perform tasks, stop and so on
